jdbcService.sql: update user_oauth2_credentials set modified = case when :modified is null then modified else :modified end, token = case when :token is null then token else :token end, active_until = case when :activeUntil is null then active_until else :activeUntil end, refresh_token = case when :refreshToken is null then refresh_token else :refreshToken end, account_id = case when :accountId is null then account_id else :accountId end, token_type = case when :tokenType is null then token_type else :tokenType end where id = :id
